data.name: Monsty Corp
data.detailed_description:
Check out Table Ball

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2094090/Table_Ball/?beta=0


About the Game

A story based, puzzle game, Monsty Corp will have you exploring the facility known as “Monsty Corp”, an advanced science facility closed down due to strange occurrences.

It's a race against time to save yourself and possibly the world from an evil AI named SAIC (Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness). Will you stop it? Or will it keep you captive forever, only time can tell.

Play as Robin and uncover the secrets to Monsty Corp

After getting stuck within the Monsty Corp facility, Robin just wants to go home and see their husband. Little do they know, it doesn't want them to leave.

Play as Alex and uncover the mystery behind your partners disappearance

Five years ago Robin went missing. And for 5 years Alex has non-stop been looking for clues to his partners disappearance. Little does he know, he may have to save Robin from the worst danger imaginable.

Features

  • Multiple Endings
  • 3D Puzzle Game
  • Various twists and turns to keep you on the edge of your seat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8145U CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
